synopsis.text: Navy, "Konpeki no Kantai" presents a unique twist on historical events, plunging viewers into a Pacific War unlike any other. Following the inexplicable resurrection of Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto, the Imperial Japanese Navy benefits from advanced technology, shifting the balance of power. As Yamamoto steers Japan towards victory against the USA, the series introduces familiar historical figures with altered first names, such as Kingston Churchill and Heinrich von Hitler. This alternate-history original video animation, produced by JC Staff and based on Yoshio Aramaki's 1992 novel, promises a thrilling and immersive experience for fans of historical reinterpretations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
